programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins(n)

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: At a time when crimes of passion result in celebrity headlines, nightclub sensation Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones) and spotlight seeking Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) both find themselves sharing space on Chicago's famed Murderess Row. They also share Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), the town's slickest lawyer with a talent for turning notorious defendants into local legends. Winner of 6 Academy Awards®(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Scar Tissue
programme.desc: A young man is stalked by a serial killer who supposedly died decades ago

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: Psychological drama from director Atom Egoyan ("The Sweet Hereafter") stars Elaine Cassidy as Felicia, an Irish girl who follows her boyfriend to England when she discovers she's pregnant with his child. Unsure of his exact whereabouts, Felicia instead comes under the sway of Joseph (Bob Hoskins), a caterer who has a violent secret history with young homeless women just like Felicia. Based on the novel by William Trevor

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: Medium Raw
programme.desc: Detective Johnny Morgan finally tracks down the deranged serial killer that kidnapped and murdered his sister 20 years earlier but is disappointed when the fiend receives life imprisonment in an insane asylum instead of the death penalty. Visiting the prisoner intending to exact revenge, Johnny is instead trapped inside the institution when a power outage frees the inmates and seals off all escape routes. Andrew Cymek, John Rhys-Davies and William B. Davis star in this horror thriller

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left

programme.title: Medium Raw

programme.title: Down To Earth
programme.desc: Chris Rock is struggling comedian Lance Burton, who is taken long before his time by an anxious angel and finds temporary refuge back on Earth in the body of a prejudiced, white millionaire. Soon Lance ("Charles" to those who only know him by his new identity) is wooing a community rights activist (Regina King) and dodging a bullet as his wife and her lover try to kill him

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: Will (Landon Liboiron) is a young man harboring a secret crush on pretty classmate Eliana (Lindsey Shaw) and even bigger secret about his past: he's the son of a werewolf and may have supernatural gifts of his own. When a mysterious attack reveals that a werewolf army is being assembled by someone from his past, he's torn between his true nature and his love for Eliana. This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: Val Kilmer stars as a famed scientist who unearths a prehistoric specimen in the Arctic that soon unleashes a swarm of dangerous parasites, forcing himself and his students to quarantine themselves or risk infecting the world

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move(n)

programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild(n)

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth(n)

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: The Mind of Mark DeFriest
programme.desc: Documentary about a legendary escape artist who comes up for parole after more than 30 years behind bars, but his chance for freedom must be weighed against his infamous past. Features interviews and graphic novel style animation

programme.title: Lenny Cooke
programme.desc: In an era when high school stars were forgoing college hoops in favor of the multi-million dollar contracts promised in the NBA draft, Lenny was supposed to be the next superstar. But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: A week before he's set to move across the country with his girlfriend, a young man impulsively sets out on a solo road trip across the US to see the nation's largest objects in this comedy of self-discovery

programme.title: Daydream Nation
programme.desc: Bored by her new town and classmates, the new girl (Kat Dennings) seduces a handsome teacher, flirts with a stoner, and avoids a local serial killer targeting teenagers. Josh Lucas and Reece Thompson costar in this offbeat dark comedy

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war

programme.title: The Jam: About the Young Idea
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the roots, rise and influences of the great British pop band, the Jam, as they spearheaded the Punk movement in the UK and became the voice of the class divide in the contentious Thatcherite era. Includes exclusive interviews, news footage and stories from the die-hard fans, all set to the soundtrack of the band's greatest songs

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: In My Father's House
programme.desc: Award winning documentary following hip-hop artist Che "Rhymefest" Smith - co-writer of the 2015 Oscar winning song "Glory" from the motion picture 'Selma' and 2005 Grammy winner for the song "Jesus Walks" with Kanye West - as he moves into his childhood home on Chicago's South Side and hesitantly sets out to reconnect with his estranged father, the man who abandoned him over twenty years ago

programme.title: Brad Williams: Fun Size
programme.desc: Hilarious stand-up comedy special featuring energetic comedian Brad Williams' inimitable take on disability, relationships, sex and race with perfect timing and explosive delivery that proves that you can in fact overcome any shortcomings... pun intended

programme.title: National Lampoon Presents Cattle Call
programme.desc: A group of actresses plot revenge after learning that a high profile casting call was just a scam cooked up by three lonely losers looking to get laid. Stars Chelsea Handler and Thomas Ian Nicholas

programme.title: The Original Kings Of Comedy
programme.desc: Four of the funniest African-American stand-up comics on the scene today take the stage in Charlotte, North Carolina to chronicle a record-setting tour that remains one of the most successful shows of all time. Cedric the Entertainer headlines with TV stars Bernie Mac, D.L. Hughley and Steve Harvey, entertaining a stadium-size gathering of more than ten thousand fans in this concert film from director Spike Lee

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war

programme.title: Brad Williams: Fun Size
programme.desc: Hilarious stand-up comedy special featuring energetic comedian Brad Williams' inimitable take on disability, relationships, sex and race with perfect timing and explosive delivery that proves that you can in fact overcome any shortcomings... pun intended

Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: The Next Hit
programme.desc: A mystery suspense thriller about a record company that takes an unorthodox approach to boosting sales by putting a 'hit' on their marquee talent's life with hopes of creating a multi-platinum recording legend

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: River's Edge
programme.desc: The lives of a group of teenagers are thrown into a moral spin when one of them murders his girlfriend. Faced with the brutal reality of death, each must decide whether to turn their friend in to the police, or to help him escape the consequences of his dreadful deed. Stars Keanu Reeves, Crispin Glover, Ione Skye and Dennis Glover(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between(n)

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse(n)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: A week before he's set to move across the country with his girlfriend, a young man impulsively sets out on a solo road trip across the US to see the nation's largest objects in this comedy of self-discovery(n)

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets(n)

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse(n)

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: At a time when crimes of passion result in celebrity headlines, nightclub sensation Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones) and spotlight seeking Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) both find themselves sharing space on Chicago's famed Murderess Row. They also share Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), the town's slickest lawyer with a talent for turning notorious defendants into local legends. Winner of 6 Academy Awards®

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: In this classic comedy based on Cameron Crowe's undercover expose on life in a Southern California high school, a group of students wrestle with love, sex, drugs and making their way into the world. Stars Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Phoebe Cates

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the first of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Beth Stelling, Iliza Shlesinger, Mark Normand, Matt Braunger, and Nate Bargatze

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Witless Protection
programme.desc: A bumbling deputy (Larry the Cable Guy) mistakes a federal witness for a kidnapping victim and takes her into "protective custody," thereby incurring the wrath of the FBI and a slew of unsavory criminals. Jenny McCarthy costars in this wacky comedy with Peter Stormare, Eric Roberts, Ivana Milicevic, Yaphet Kotto (as the same character he played in "Midnight Run") and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Renée Zellweger star in this inspiring tale of a promising boxer who battles the odds and a heavyweight champion to support his family during the Depression. Academy Award® winner Ron Howard directs

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: A Perfect Day
programme.desc: A group of aid workers tries to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone as humor, drama, emotion, routine and danger all fit into one perfect day. Stars Benicio Del Toro and Tim Robbins

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: From writer/director Paul Haggis ("Million Dollar Baby") comes this Best Picture Oscar-winning drama that follows the intersecting lives of several Los Angeles natives whose attitudes toward race are challenged by a series of fateful events. Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A young writer begins an affair with an older French woman, whose open marriage to a diplomat dictates that they can only meet for two hours each evening but their growing passion leads him to want more than just a fleeting romance

programme.title: That Gal...Who was in That Thing: That Guy 2
programme.desc: Documentary following eight actresses as they detail their experiences in Hollywood and wrestle with plastic surgery, race, sexism, nudity, recognition, double standards, age and family

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: In My Father's House
programme.desc: Award winning documentary following hip-hop artist Che "Rhymefest" Smith - co-writer of the 2015 Oscar winning song "Glory" from the motion picture 'Selma' and 2005 Grammy winner for the song "Jesus Walks" with Kanye West - as he moves into his childhood home on Chicago's South Side and hesitantly sets out to reconnect with his estranged father, the man who abandoned him over twenty years ago

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw

programme.title: Anesthesia
programme.desc: Multiple lives intersect and connect in the aftermath of the brutal assault of a philosophy professor in New York City

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world(n)

programme.title: Have You Met Miss Jones?
programme.desc: Out of pills and jonesing for a high, Jackie is confronted about the missing drugs from Oncology; Coop decides to start a family of his own and finds an old girlfriend on Facebook; Zoey reconsiders her relationship to Lenny after he's put on a heart monitor(n)

programme.title: F**k the Lemurs
programme.desc: Grace asks her psychologist to be put on medication; Jackie is placed on probation over the drugs she stole from Oncology; Coop reserves the chapel for a wedding(n)

programme.title: Batting Practice
programme.desc: O'Hara agrees to help Jackie dose down under her supervision; Kevin is evasive and edgy with both his wife and Eddie; Akalitus loses the First Lady visit; Zoey throws a Nurse's Appreciation Week party; Kelly confesses he is responsible for Jackie's probation(n)

programme.title: ...deaf blind tumor pee-test...
programme.desc: Jackie dodges Akalitus's request for a urine sample and forgets to order a cake for Coop's wedding; Kevin makes a stunning confession that leads to a marital split; Coop's bride stands him up at the altar(n)

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women(n)

programme.title: Channel Sex News
programme.desc: When a beautiful TV producer swaps lives with a gorgeous high-class escort for a news story, they both take a wild trip into an alternate lifestyle as high stakes drama and steamy sex hit the 11 o'clock news(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy(n)

programme.title: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on(n)

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: HOOPS U
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes documentary look into two major college basketball programs as they prepare for the NCAA Tournament. Competing in the ACC, coach Mike Brey and Notre Dame's Fighting Irish have risen to become a Top Ten force to be reckoned with. University of Maryland, under coach Mark Turgeon, is making the most of the Terrapins first year in the Big Ten. Take a front-row seat at the final month of conference play and see what it takes - from the classroom to the locker room - to make it to the top(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara(n)

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl(n)

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: As waves of immigrants swell the population, corruption thrives in lower Manhattan's Five Points section. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as Amsterdam Vallon, an Irish immigrant who returns to New York seeking revenge against Bill "The Butcher" (Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis), a rival gang leader who killed his father. But Amsterdam's personal vendetta becomes part of the gang warfare in director Martin Scorsese's sweeping historical epic

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: Breakup Sex
programme.desc: When a stormy couple -- who use fighting as foreplay -- finally split up, their friends are all too eager to set them up with new people but no matter how terrible they are for each other, breaking up always leads to making up

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Written and directed by the Coen brothers, this quirky crime thriller follows the desperate plight of a car salesman who is so far in debt that he hires two thugs to kidnap his own wife so that he can reap the cash ransom from her wealthy father. Stars Frances McDormand, William H. Macy and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Written and directed by the Coen brothers, this quirky crime thriller follows the desperate plight of a car salesman who is so far in debt that he hires two thugs to kidnap his own wife so that he can reap the cash ransom from her wealthy father. Stars Frances McDormand, William H. Macy and Steve Buscemi

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars in this dramatic thriller, inspired by true events, as a Brooklyn lawyer who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA sends him on a near impossible mission to negotiate the release of a captured American pilot. Also stars Mark Rylance

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: In this adventure surf film a young woman, haunted by the memory of her deceased mother, leaves Malibu behind and heads to the breathtaking coast of South Africa on a quest to fulfill a surfing dream, with nothing but her mom's journal as a guide and a fun-loving group of surf fanatics cheering her on

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the iconic character of John Rambo in this action sequel that finds the middle-aged veteran living quietly in Thailand as a mechanic and snake wrangler - until a group of American missionaries are caught up in the bloody Burmese civil war raging nearby and reach out to the reluctant killing machine for rescue. Julie Benz, Paul Schulze and Ken Howard costar in this long-awaited follow-up

programme.title: Black Christmas (2006)
programme.desc: This terrifying remake of the classic 1974 horror movie credited with spawning the "slasher" subgenre stars Katie Cassidy, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Lacey Chabert and Michelle Trachtenberg as ill-fated residents of a sorority house that also happens to be the childhood home of a psychotic killer - and his destination when he uses a candy cane to lethal effect in breaking out of an insane asylum. Oliver Hudson and Andrea Martin costar in this effective holiday scream-fest from writer/director Glen Morgan

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this American classic stars Tom Cruise as an idealistic young soldier who proudly enlists during the Vietnam war and returns as a quadriplegic. Co-stars Kyra Sedgwick and Willem Dafoe. Eight Oscar nominations, including a win for Best Director by Oliver Stone

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: During World War I, a disparate group of young American adventurers comes to France to fight for the Lafayette Escadrille, a volunteer squadron of pilots battling the forces of fascism in the years before their country entered the war. James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Red Corner
programme.desc: Richard Gere stars as a hotshot entertainment lawyer who travels to China for business and has a one-night stand with a young Chinese woman, then wakes to find that she has been murdered and he has been framed with the crime

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: In this martial arts action flick, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a Canadian Mountie who is assigned to a bizarre case involving the murder of prison inmates. Sent to jail, in the undercover guise of a criminal, he is hot on the trail of the killer until one of his former busts is transferred to the same prison

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: In the 1870s Wild West, a peaceful American settler kills his family's murderer, which unleashes the fury of a notorious gang leader who is hell bent on hunting the settler down, in this blood spattered saga of sin and redemption. Stars Eva Green

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: From writer/director Paul Haggis ("Million Dollar Baby") comes this Best Picture Oscar-winning drama that follows the intersecting lives of several Los Angeles natives whose attitudes toward race are challenged by a series of fateful events. Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A notorious 1971 bank robbery in London is the basis for this exciting, suspenseful thriller starring Jason Statham as a car dealer who agrees to the dangerous heist in order to finance a new family but gets more than he bargains for when the break-in yields not just riches but a slew of valuable state secrets. Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 2/24/2017
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" returns with a talented trio of prospects determined to fight for a world title, including super welterweight Chris Pearson (14-1, 10 KOs), cruiserweight Andrew Tabiti (13-0, 11 KOs) and lightweight Saul Rodriguez (20-0-1, 15 KOs all in separate bouts(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n)

programme.title: American Heart
programme.desc: For most of us, the notion of living on the streets is little more than food for thought. But for a homeless father (Jeff Bridges) and his teenage son (Edward Furlong), it's a cold, hard fact of life. Director Martin Bell first explored life in the not-so-great outdoors with his 1984 documentary "Streetwise," an unforgettable look at the day-to-day tragedy of Seattle's street teens. With this eye-opening drama, he looks at this avoidable human catastrophe from a somewhat different perspective. Featuring music by Tom Waits(n)

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman(n)

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Well-meaning retired cop Pally (Kiefer Sutherland) is only trying to help out his stepbrother Ray (Anthony LaPaglia) when he agrees to bankroll a long-shot racehorse. But a big-time Mob figure (Daniel Benzali) also has an interest in the animal and before you can say "conflict of interest," Pally and Ray are mired in business with some very shady figures. Lothaire Bluteau and Radha Mitchell costar in this superb crime drama from writer/director Mark Malone ("Dead of Winter," "Hoods")(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Renée Zellweger star in this inspiring tale of a promising boxer who battles the odds and a heavyweight champion to support his family during the Depression. Academy Award® winner Ron Howard directs(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Denzel Washington stars as Rubin "Hurricane" Carter -- a man whose dreams of winning the middleweight boxing title are destroyed when he is wrongly accused of killing three people in a New Jersey bar. Years later, in jail, a young man begins an impassioned and moving fight to prove Hurricane's innocence. Also stars Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a man stumbles upon a bloody crime scene, a pickup truck loaded with heroin and two million dollars in cash, his decision to take the money and run ignites an unstoppable chain reaction of violence and mayhem in writer/director Joel and Ethan Coen's Academy Award winning thriller. Starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin(n)

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards® for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness(n)

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Carmen and her brother Juni think they're typical kids until they discover their parents are former spies who've been kidnapped by a sinister children's show host. Now it's up to a brother-sister duo to rescue their parents and find out if master spy skills run in the family in this family adventure starring Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino and Alan Cumming

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: Shadow Zone: The Undead Express
programme.desc: A teenager (Chauncey Leopardi) given to supernatural confabulation encounters a sect of vampires living in the subway tunnels of New York, but nobody believes his wild story until one of his friends is kidnapped by the bloodsuckers. Ron Silver and Natanya Ross costar in this young adult horror fantasy

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Candy and Brandy
programme.desc: A couple's relationship endures a dramatic confrontation that leads to a painful breakup - a situation most notable for the fact that they are portrayed by children in this award-winning tone poem from Spanish filmmaker Ander Duque

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: The Last Keepers
programme.desc: Zosia Mamet stars as a teenage girl who learns that she descends from a long line of powerful witches and strives to embrace her true destiny in this fantasy drama

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: The Discoverers
programme.desc: A washed up history professor takes his begrudging teenage kids on a road trip to a conference, in the hope of getting his career back on track but when his elderly father goes AWOL, he is forced to make a detour on a Lewis and Clark historical reenactment trek, which prompts a family journey of discovery and connection. Stars Lewis Birch and Madeleine Martin

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
programme.desc: When a ten-year-old boy (Freddie Highmore) discovers a magical world of tiny people living in his backyard, he must save them from the impending demolition of his home. David Bowie, Madonna and Snoop Doggy Dogg provide some of the celebrity voices for this charming family fantasy from director Luc Besson

programme.title: Flyboys
programme.desc: During World War I, a disparate group of young American adventurers comes to France to fight for the Lafayette Escadrille, a volunteer squadron of pilots battling the forces of fascism in the years before their country entered the war. James Franco, Martin Henderson, Tyler Labine, Jean Reno and Jennifer Decker star in this stirringly patriotic salute to forgotten heroes(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship(n)

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: A therapeutic retreat to a bucolic Colorado setting for couples that are seeking to mend their marriages turns into a full-blown crisis when one participant shows up with a sexy temptress in tow. Writer, director and actor Tyler Perry stars with Janet Jackson in this domestic comedy-drama, with Jill Scott, Malik Yoba, Richard T. Jones and Michael Jai White

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A group of successful college friends reunite for a wedding, but when one of the bridesmaids gets her hands on the best man's steamy new novel about to hit bookstores, a series of scandals about the friends are revealed that wreak havoc on their relationships. Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.title: Whore (1991)
programme.desc: Theresa Russell ("Black Widow") stars in this unflinching portrait of a belligerent, unrepentant - and entirely unsympathetic - prostitute that's a stark contrast to Hollywood's many "hooker with a heart of gold" fables. Antonio Fargas, Jason Saucier and Benjamin Mouton co-star in this dark drama from director Ken Russell ("Crimes of Passion," "The Lair of the White Worm")

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame

programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars in this terrifying remake of a Japanese horror classic about a blind concert violinist whose double corneal transplant gives her the gift of sight, but also the curse of seeing horrifying future events. Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey and Rade Serbedzija costar

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Aleah
programme.desc: A pregnant 17-year-old girl turns to the violent streets of New York after her abusive mother and boyfriend her abandon her, in this short film created by 16-year-old Brooklyn writer Nialani Pringle and acclaimed director Laurie Collyer

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A young writer begins an affair with an older French woman, whose open marriage to a diplomat dictates that they can only meet for two hours each evening but their growing passion leads him to want more than just a fleeting romance

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: This classic holiday romantic comedy interweaves the stories of nine contemporary Londoners, from the handsome bachelor Prime Minister who falls for a junior staffer to a schoolboy with a crush, as they wrestle with the funny, poignant and often silly side of love. Stars Laura Linney, Hugh Grant, Emma Thompson, Colin Firth and Alan Rickman

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind(n)

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power(n)

programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay(n)

programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson(n)

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson(n)

Stars Josh Hartnett(n)

programme.title: Summer of '42
programme.desc: Three teens vacationing on a New England island in 1942 get involved in mischief and romance, while one of them becomes enamored of a lonely young bride whose husband is off to war

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: In 1920s Australia, a sheep drover who loves his nomadic life attempts to settle down for his wife and child, but he chafes at the responsibilities that come with owning a farm

programme.title: Swing Time
programme.desc: Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers' sixth screen pairing, about a professional hoofer and sometime gambler who enters into a fine romance with a pretty dance instructor. Featuring the Oscar-winning Best Song, "The Way You Look Tonight

programme.title: A Tale of Two Cities
programme.desc: A dramatization of the French Revolution's victims include a man who makes the ultimate sacrifice for the woman he loves, but cannot have

programme.title: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: Frank Sinatra plays a womanizing Manhattan showbiz agent who gets involved with an aspiring actress who is out to snare a husband, and has ever so subtly set the bait. The title tune was nominated for a Best Song Oscar

programme.title: Test Pilot
programme.desc: An aviation test pilot relies on the support of his wife and his best friend to help keep him sober and in his right mind, but the stress of putting his life in danger takes its toll

programme.title: That Girl from Paris
programme.desc: A French soprano stows away on a ship to escape a jealous fiancé, only to fall hard for a band leader. Contains the songs "Seal It With a Kiss," "The Blue Danube," "Una Voce Poco Fa" and "The Call to Arms"

programme.title: That Hamilton Woman
programme.desc: A recounting of the ill-fated romance between British naval hero Lord Admiral Horatio Nelson and Lady Emma Hamilton, a woman of common birth who was married to a lord at the time of their meeting

programme.title: That Man from Rio
programme.desc: Director Philippe De Broca's parody of action-adventure films, about a young couple (Jean-Paul Belmondo, Francoise Dorleac) pursued by villains from Paris to Brazil. Catalan: Jean Servais. De Castro: Adolfo Celi. Lola: Simone Renant. Tupac: Milton Ribeiro

programme.title: Them!
programme.desc: Atomic-bomb testing spawns an army of giant mutant ants that march through the storm drains of Los Angeles

programme.title: They Were Expendable
programme.desc: A saga of the PT boats and the sailors who manned them in the Philippines during WWII. Inspired by actual events

programme.title: The Thin Man
programme.desc: First and best of the famous whodunit series has the wisecracking, martini-sipping husband-and-wife sleuthing team of Nick and Nora Charles investigating the disappearance of an inventor who later is implicated in the murder of his secretary. The film, an adaptation of a Dashiell Hammett private-eye classic, was followed by five sequels. Incidentally, "The Thin Man" refers to the inventor, not Nick Charles. (cc)

programme.title: The Third Man
programme.desc: In post-WWII Vienna, a writer looks into the mysterious death of his old friend. His investigation leads him to some troubling discoveries amidst the ruined city's web of intrigue and corruption

programme.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
programme.desc: A reconstruction of the daring 1942 bombing run over Japan, that was led by Lt. Col. James H. Doolittle, chronicles the mission from the perspective of B-25 pilot Capt. Ted Lawson and his crew. The screenplay is based on Lawson's book about the attack

programme.title: A Thousand Clowns
programme.desc: In New York City, a happy nonconformist chucks the rat race and leaves his job as head writer for a popular children's TV show, but is forced to reconsider when social workers threaten to take away his 12-year-old nephew, whom he is raising. Screenwriter Herb Gardner was nominated for Best Adapted Screenplay, based on his Broadway hit. (cc)

programme.title: Thousands Cheer
programme.desc: An acrobat enlists in the Army and wants to put on a Big Show for his fellow servicemen. Along the way, he falls in love with the daughter of his colonel

programme.title: Three Comrades
programme.desc: Drama based on the novel by Erich Maria Remarque, about three battle-weary, disillusioned soldiers, returning to Germany after World War I. The three men pool their savings and open an auto-repair shop, where they meet a beautiful woman harboring a secret

programme.title: Three Little Words
programme.desc: The story of songsmiths Bert Kalmar and Harry Ruby, and their stratospheric rise to fame

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: In 17th-century France, a provincial upstart cadet joins the fabled Musketeers, striking up an indestructible friendship with three particular soldiers, who together thwart political conspiracies as they fight for the honor of their beloved Queen Anne

programme.title: Through a Glass Darkly
programme.desc: In Ingmar Bergman's Oscar-winning study of an uncommunicative family and their relationships, a mental patient, recently released from an institution, develops an obsession with her brother

programme.title: The Time Machine
